results.title: Blockade of renin-angiotensin system prevents micturition dysfunction in renovascular hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The effects of the anti-@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ drugs @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ (AT1 antagonist) and @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ (@GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor) in comparison with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_24925 @@@beta1-adrenoceptor@@@ antagonist independently of RAS blockade) have been investigated in @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001745 @@@bladder and urethral dysfunctions@@@ during @DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@renovascular hypertension@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ramos-Filho AC, Moscoso JA, Calmasini F, Faria Jde A, Anhê GF, Mónica FZ, Antunes E. Blockade of renin-angiotensin system prevents micturition dysfunction in renovascular hypertensive rats. Eur J Pharmacol. 2014 Sep 5;738():285-92. PMID: 24881522
